title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-host LLMs (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, …) behind a dead-simple REST & CLI API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node & browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; sync & async generators.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models for chat, tools, embeddings.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (models, chats, uploads, admin).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Android compatible.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama REST API; supports streaming chat.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community Rust CLI with interactive REPL, model search, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline coding copilot.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (cuda, rocm, cpu) and compose examples.

title: ollama-nest
summary: NestJS module wrapper for Ollama with decorators and interceptors.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community-maintained Go SDK for Ollama; supports streaming chat & embeddings.

title: ollama-embeddings
summary: Minimal repo showing how to generate embeddings with Ollama for vector DBs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators & embedders.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: End-to-end RAG chatbot template using Ollama, LangChain, and Streamlit.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that exposes Ollama models to servers with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app integrating Ollama models into channels/DMs with thread context.
